amendment.description: Amendments en bloc assist the Consolidated Farm Service Agency in implementing the Agricultural Market Transition Act; permit the transfer of catastrophic insurance fees collected by the Department of Agriculture to private insurance companies; change funding for the establishment of the Office of Risk Management; and require that the Secretary of Agriculture maintain the historic share of exports with regards to the sale of wheat flour.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, comprised of several amendments offered en bloc, to make technical changes to the bill. The amendment would also include the provisions of the Tiahrt amendment (amendment No. 9 in H. Rept. 104-463) to require the Secretary of Agriculture to use whatever resources are necessary to maintain the U.S. share of the foreign market for wheat flour.

action.text: Roberts amendment (A001) modified by unanimous consent. Modification would delete the provisions of the en bloc amendments relating to the authorization to grant rights-of-way.
On agreeing to the Roberts amendments (A001) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
